Text:
License is for AVAST AV pro!!! Even if IS is installed it switches it to AV pro.
Provided crack didn't work on W7 x32 and x64 SP1. After inserting ashbase.dll AVAST IS can not be started. Instead is giving the notice "Can not initiate aswData.dll". Tried in safe mode and by killing process with no luck. Old ashbase.dll for 1289 did not work either. It looks AVAST made their homework back than.
